text: The Iron Curtain is a 1948 American thriller movie directed by William A. Wellman and based on the memoirs of Igor Gouzenko. It stars Dana Andrews, Gene Tierney, June Havoc, Berry Kroeger, Edna Best, Stefan Schnabel and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by William A. Wellman
title: The Iron Curtain (movie)
